name: airport_arrivals
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool flight_fare_search.
Tool description: Elevate your travel game with Flight Fare Search API! Get real-time flight data, fares, and airport info for seamless travel planning. Transform your app into a powerful travel companion with Flight Fare Search.
API description: Fetch the flight arrivals for a specified airport on a given date, optionally filtered by carrier.

airportcode.description: The IATA code of the airport.

carriercode.description: The IATA code of the airline carrier. Defaults to None.

date.description: The date for which to fetch the arrivals, in the format YYYY-MM-DD. Defaults to None.
